transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good morning, sir.
Customer: Good morning ji, Deepak baat kar raha hu sir India Mart se, kaise hain?
Executive: Deepak ji badhiya ji, sir mujhe listing jo hai na sir high nahi ho pa rahi hai, response maine aapse pehle kaha tha maine isme bhi dala tha.
Customer: Kya kare sir?
Executive: Meri response jo hai na achcha nahi mil pa raha hai India Mart par pata nahi kya issue aa raha hai sir, abhi to main dekh raha hu sab kuch theek chal raha hai.
Customer: Abhi teen char din pehle hi to mera aapse discuss hua tha sir, call response rate bhi achcha hai aapka.
Executive: Nahi call sir response to call aa rahi hai normal itni nahi aa rahi isme jo hai dusri listing high bhi nahi hai naam bhi show nahi ho raha hai meri company ka.
Customer: Sir maine aapko bataya tha jis jis area mein aap buyleads purchase karenge us us area mein aap dikhenge sir, aap bol rahe hain Khurja ke andar dikhe to wo to maine aapko us din bhi bataya tha Khurja ke andar aap nahi dikhenge.
Executive: Aap bol rahe the ki mujhe Khurja mein cheeze nahi chahiye Khurja mein main deal hi nahi karta hu supplier bahut hai yaha pe to Khurja mein nahi dikhenge sir aap.
Customer: Jaise maan lo main aapko ek second aapko bata bhi deta hu jaise aapki jo sabse jyada dealing hai main aapko bata deta hu ek second line par rahiyega.
Executive: Sabse jyada jo dealing hai aapki Delhi ke andar hai.
Customer: Theek hai?
Executive: Delhi ke andar aap apni listing dekhiyega sir Delhi mein aap dikh rahe hain.
Customer: Delhi mein main aapko ek baar screenshot bhi aapko bhej deta hu ek second spot New Delhi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Sir Deepak sir pehle to mujhe maine abhi ek do mahine pehle search kiya tha Khurja mein to pehle to mujhe dikh raha tha naam meri company ka.
Executive: Sir aapne waha se buyleads purchase ki honge, aap mujhe ye bataiyega sir jab aapko Khurja ke andar kaam nahi karna hai to sir dikhna kya hai mere ye samajh nahi aa raha hai aap neeche ki taraf list karte hue chale jayenge to aap Khurja mein bhi dikhenge sir.
Executive: Aap dekhiye main aapko ek cheez batata hu bahut simple language mein sir.
Customer: India Mart run karta hai AI pe theek hai AI jo hota hai AI aapke buylead consumption ke call response ko inquiry response ko mature karta hai theek hai wo cheeze dekhta hai uske according jaise aap instagram use karte hain correct hai instagram pe jaisi reels aap dekhte hain aisi hi reels aapko within a one hours mein ya within a 10 minutes mein aapko wahi pattern aapko show hone lagti hai.
Executive: Aisi aati hai sahi hai.
Customer: Right na same as it is India Mart yaani koi bhi digital platform hai sir wo AI pe hi run karta hai aap India Mart to chhodiye aap Flipkart ko utha lijiye aap suppose that Flipkart open karte hain Flipkart pe aap do aap din mein paanch chhe bar mobile dekh lijiye.
Executive: Koi mobile search karne lijiye display pe aapko mobile se mobiles dikhenge aur koi product dikhega hi nahi sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai yahi cheeze hain isi reason ki wajah se buyleads aapka consumption ratio jaise hi buyleads consumption ratio jis area se aapka better hoga listing us isi area mein aapki dikhni start ho jayegi jis product mein aap yaani suppose that aapki dealing hai pot ke andar pot mein aap aapki listing better hai us area mein dikhne lagegi jis se aap buylead consumption jyada hai.
Executive: Calls ka flow better hai inquiries ka response rate jyada hai aise aise aap dikhne start ho jayenge to aap is cheez ko to sir chhod hi dijiyega ki main Khurja ke andar nahi dikh raha hu is cheez se sir koi impact nahi padne wala hai reason being ki waha pe aap dhandha nahi kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: Correct.
Executive: If aap chahte hain ki mujhe wahi pe hi dikhna hai saari cheeze dikhni hai to aap fir apni website run karaiye website aapki har jagah pe dikhegi.
Customer: Sir listing jaise list meri to wahi complaint thi listing high ki jaise.
Executive: Main aapko sir baar baar wahi cheeze samjha raha hu ki aap us us area mein dikhenge jis jis area mein aapka buylead consumption sabse jyada hai.
Customer: Pen India mein to dikhta hi hu na sir main.
Executive: Jaise main baat karu kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Pen India mein to dikhta hi hu na sir meri company ka.
Executive: Catalog sir catalog hi aapka pen India level ka hai pen India mein hi dikhenge aapki koi listing service thodi hai ki aapne top 10 cities mein aapne promotion karaya ho to top 10 mein hi dikhenge ya top 20 mein hi dikhenge top 50 mein hi dikhenge aapki to all India service hai sir har kahin pe dikhenge.
Executive: Bhale hi aap jaise suppose that Ghaziabad ke andar deal nahi karte Ghaziabad ke andar aap last mein dikhe fir dikhenge jarur sir kyunki aap India Mart ke portal pe run karte hain same product mein aap kahin bhi dekhenge waha pe apni company kahin na kahin dikh hi jayegi sir ye hota hai jaise sabse jyada Delhi ke andar aapki buylead consumption ratio hai Delhi ke andar aap achcha dikh rahe hain sir Gurgaon hai Noida hai Mumbai hai Ghaziabad hai ye area hai sir aapke top 10 mein jaise Chennai Faridabad Moradabad Bangaluru Ghaziabad Hyderabad Ahmedabad uske baad Greater Noida aata hai Greater Noida Indore Pune Surat.
Customer: In city mein meri listing high show ho rahi hai.
Executive: Bilkul sir bilkul.
Executive: Main aapko aapko screenshot bhi ek baar bhej deta hu aap ye check kar lijiyega theek hai jaha pe jaha pe aap dekh rahe hain ek second rukiyega.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Fir bhi aap suno sir sudhar kariye kuch na kuch bas ye hai.
Executive: Sir aap meri side jo hai bahut.
Customer: Meri meri baat suniyega sir aap is cheez ko jo apni complaint ye sir meri jo koi matlab party se meri baat bhi ho rahi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Matlab deal nahi ho pa rahi hai pehli baat to ye deal nahi ho pa rahi hai dusri baat ye small order ki requirement jyada aati hai small chhod nahi aa pa rahi hai verified order buylead pick kijiyega sir.
Executive: Bulk order.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: GST verified buylead lijiyega waha se aapko relevancy jyada rahegi.
Executive: Bhale hi aapke paas do aaye but aap GST verified lijiye bulk order lijiye.
Customer: Inquiry to aani chahiye na call aur inquiry bulk order.
Executive: Main aapko main aapko main aapko bata raha hu sir.
Executive: Main keh raha hu sir aapke paas din ki 50 buylead na aaye aur do fruitful aa jaye to wo aapke liye faydemand hai ya 50 buylead faydemand hai?
Customer: Do faydemand hai sir.
Executive: Do faydemand hai na kyunki wo aapke product se related hai fruitfully hai wo convert hone ke chances jyada hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Ab ye ye aapne photo jo bheja hai mujhe ye ye matlab city in in shahron mein meri company show ho rahi hai.
Executive: Bilkul sir bilkul kyunki is area mein is is area mein aapka buylead consumption ratio sabse behtar hai.
Customer: Theek hai us us hisab se aap dikhenge sir.
Executive: Theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Chalo Khurja ka kar do aap sir Khurja ki main theek hai aap buylead buylead consumption ratio aap Khurja se badhaiyega Khurja mein bhi dikhne lagenge sir aap.
Executive: Haan aap is cheez ke liye aap is cheez ke liye nishchint rahiye buylead ko bhi to dikhna chahiye na ye Khurja ka banda hai sir ji sir ji aap buylead aap filter laga ke teen ek hafte use kar lijiye ek hafte ke baad mein aap Khurja mein dikhne lagenge ye bhi guarantee hai.
Customer: Chaliye ye aisa to nahi hai aisa to nahi hai sir Khurja ki buyleads mein utha nahi raha hu to koi matlab buyleads dekh bhi raha hai to use lag nahi raha hai buylead buyer ko matlab Khurja ka banda nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Sir aisa nahi hai maine aapko kya bola maine aapko ek chhota sa example diya instagram ka jis jis area se aap jis jis product ko aap jyada dekhte hain wahi reels aapke paas mein aani start ho jati hai same India Mart hai Flipkart Amazon Mitra same same platform pe run karte hain.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Bilkul.
Executive: Theek hai na aap use kijiyega koi bhi issue hai personal number hai whatsapp number aapke paas available hai aap mujhe connect kijiyega theek hai sir theek hai sir okay sir okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Listing is not high, response is not good.

- Name is not showing of the company.

- Deals are not happening with parties.

- Getting more small order requirements.



Resolution:

- Explained that visibility depends on buylead purchase.

- Explained about AI and buylead consumption ratio.

- Suggested to run a website for visibility.

- Suggested to pick GST verified buyleads.

- Suggested to use filter for buyleads.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- listing, buyleads, ai, visibility, gst, orders
